mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SCH_NO, EMP_NO, SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_START, SCH_END, SCH_SHARE, SCH_CORRECTIONDATE) VALUES (SEQ_SCH_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{schTitle}, #{schContent}, #{schStart}, #{schEnd}, #{schShare}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT SCH_NO, EMP_NO, SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_START, SCH_END, SCH_STATUS, SCH_SHARE FROM SCHEDULE JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (EMP_NO) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND SCH_SHARE = 'M' AND SCH_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT SCH_NO, EMP_NO, SCH_TITLE, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_START, SCH_END, SCH_STATUS, SCH_SHARE FROM SCHEDULE JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (EMP_NO) WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND SCH_SHARE = 'D' AND SCH_STATUS = 'Y'
